localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Verbz is a voice productivity app for teams. Create notes, assign tasks, make announcements, run stand-ups, or just chat. Talk or type, listen or read.
blogPost.body: Verbz is a voice productivity app for teams. Create notes, assign tasks, make announcements, run stand-ups, or just chat. Talk or type, listen or read.
blogPost.title: Verbz - Create tasks, notes, and chat, all with voice
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: Verbz是一款针对团队的语音生产力应用。创建笔记，分配任务，发布公告，运行站立，或只是聊天。谈话或打字，听或读。
localize.tagline: 创建任务、笔记和聊天，都可以用语音来完成

localize.description: Verbz是一款針對團隊的語音生產力應用。創建筆記，分配任務，發佈公告，運行站立，或只是聊天。談話或打字，聽或讀。
localize.tagline: 創建任務、筆記和聊天，都可以用語音來完成

previous.excerpt: Design is a continually changing environment. What’s cool one day, is old the next. So designers always have to be on their toes - it’s a pretty hectic gig. And this is where Yizy comes into play!
previous.title: Yizy - Give Meaning to your Screenshots and Bookmarks!

localize.description: 设计是一个不断变化的环境。今天很酷的东西，明天就会过时。所以设计师必须时刻保持警惕，这是一个相当忙碌的工作。而这正是Yizy发挥作用的地方。
localize.tagline: 给你的截屏和书签赋予意义!

localize.description: 設計是一個不斷變化的環境。今天很酷的東西，明天就會過時。所以設計師必須時刻保持警惕，這是一個相當忙碌的工作。而這正是Yizy發揮作用的地方。
localize.tagline: 給你的截屏和書籤賦予意義!

next.excerpt: Want to deliver higher quality software cheaper and faster? Then Code Quality Guide is something you were looking for. It is a comprehensive and practical guide for those who want to improve the quality of code with the best techniques and strategies.
next.title: Complete Code Quality Guide - Learn everything you should know about code quality

localize.description: 想要以更低的成本和更快的速度提供更高质量的软件吗？那么《代码质量指南》就是你要找的东西。对于那些想用最好的技术和策略提高代码质量的人来说，这是一本全面而实用的指南。
localize.tagline: 学习你应该知道的关于代码质量的一切

localize.description: 想要以更低的成本和更快的速度提供更高質量的軟件嗎？那麼《代碼質量指南》就是你要找的東西。對於那些想用最好的技術和策略提高代碼質量的人來說，這是一本全面而實用的指南。
localize.tagline: 學習你應該知道的關於代碼質量的一切
